verses.text: \sc Lord\sc*, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: Neither do I exercise myself in great \add matters\add*, or in \add things\add* too high for me.
Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, As a child that is weaned of his mother: My soul \add is even\add* as a weaned child.
Let Israel hope in the \sc Lord\sc* From henceforth and for ever.
